ygData.subject: Re: Feign Death to the nth power
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Or maybe it is a company who is trying to change the way they deal with customers?  Sometimes I wish you guys would just make up your mind. You say you
ygData.messageBody:
>
>
>This is the same company that changed our version of Feign Death without any
>input from the people who play the game. Why are they suddenly asking for
>opinions? I say it should be changed, if just to level the playing field. I
>guess this goes to prove thast if you play a popular class you get special
>benefits, but if you are the minority you get walked all over. Oh, well all
>the
>Necros will scream that it would be unfair to take away this unbalancing "bug"
>and we will still get stuck with our nerfed FD.
>
>Shando, 17th circle, Bertoxxulous

Or maybe it is a company who is trying to change the way they deal with
customers? Sometimes I wish you guys would just make up your mind.
You say you want more input into the game. Then they ask for your opinion
and you complain about that. Sheesh.
